In this shirt, it’s a little tight and so the bottoms of the shirt fold up a bit that won’t stay down when i try to fix it. other than that it’s cute and vibrant in color and good for the price, comfortable material and a versatile and soft staple piece but if you got a lil mommy pouch like me maybe size up one.
